languages.text: "Правда?" {n}Джай недоверчиво смотрит на вас.{/n} "Тогда ты очень, очень странн{mf|ый|ая}. А я — очень везучая. Хвала Великому". {n}Нервный смешок вырывается из груди Джай, заставляя ее слегка покраснеть.{/n}

"Really?" {n}Jae looks at you in disbelief.{/n} "Then you are very, very strange. And I am very lucky. Praise be to the Exalted One." {n}A nervous chuckle bubbles up from her chest, and she blushes slightly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Правда?" {n}Джай недоверчиво смотрит на вас.{/n} "Тогда ты очень, очень странн{mf|ый|ая}. А я — очень везучая. Хвала Великому". {n}Нервный смешок вырывается из груди Джай, заставляя ее слегка покраснеть.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Really?" {n}Jae looks at you in disbelief.{/n} "Then you are very, very strange. And I am very lucky. Praise be to the Exalted One." {n}A nervous chuckle bubbles up from her chest, and she blushes slightly.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿De verdad?». {n}Jae te mira, incrédula.{/n} «Entonces es usted una persona singular y yo muy afortunada. Alabado sea el Exaltado». {n}Una risita nerviosa burbujea en su pecho y se sonroja ligeramente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Really?" {n}Jae looks at you in disbelief.{/n} "Then you are very, very strange. And I am very lucky. Praise be to the Exalted One." {n}A nervous chuckle bubbles up from her chest, and she blushes slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad?». {n}Jae te mira, incrédula.{/n} «Entonces es usted una persona singular y yo muy afortunada. Alabado sea el Exaltado». {n}Una risita nerviosa burbujea en su pecho y se sonroja ligeramente.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “真的吗？”{n}婕伊以怀疑的目光看着你。{/n}“那你可真是个非常、非常古怪的怪人，我也真的很幸运。赞美至高无上的神皇。”{n}她的胸腔里发出一阵紧张的笑声，脸颊微微泛红。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Really?" {n}Jae looks at you in disbelief.{/n} "Then you are very, very strange. And I am very lucky. Praise be to the Exalted One." {n}A nervous chuckle bubbles up from her chest, and she blushes slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “真的吗？”{n}婕伊以怀疑的目光看着你。{/n}“那你可真是个非常、非常古怪的怪人，我也真的很幸运。赞美至高无上的神皇。”{n}她的胸腔里发出一阵紧张的笑声，脸颊微微泛红。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ほんとに？」{n}ジェイは信じられないといった目であなたを見る。{/n}「あんたってすっごく変わってるよ。それに私は運がいい。エグザルテッド・ワンに讃美あれ」{n}こわばった笑い声が胸から湧き上がり、彼女はわずかに顔を赤らめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Really?" {n}Jae looks at you in disbelief.{/n} "Then you are very, very strange. And I am very lucky. Praise be to the Exalted One." {n}A nervous chuckle bubbles up from her chest, and she blushes slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ほんとに？」{n}ジェイは信じられないといった目であなたを見る。{/n}「あんたってすっごく変わってるよ。それに私は運がいい。エグザルテッド・ワンに讃美あれ」{n}こわばった笑い声が胸から湧き上がり、彼女はわずかに顔を赤らめる。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vraiment ? {n}répond-elle avec une expression incrédule.{/n} Dans ce cas, c'est que vous êtes un être à part et que j'ai beaucoup de chance de vous avoir. Grâce soit rendue à l'Exalté. » {n}Un gloussement nerveux s'échappe de sa poitrine et elle rougit jusqu'aux oreilles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Really?" {n}Jae looks at you in disbelief.{/n} "Then you are very, very strange. And I am very lucky. Praise be to the Exalted One." {n}A nervous chuckle bubbles up from her chest, and she blushes slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? {n}répond-elle avec une expression incrédule.{/n} Dans ce cas, c'est que vous êtes un être à part et que j'ai beaucoup de chance de vous avoir. Grâce soit rendue à l'Exalté. » {n}Un gloussement nerveux s'échappe de sa poitrine et elle rougit jusqu'aux oreilles.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wirklich?" {n}Jae blickt dich ungläubig an.{/n} "Dann seid Ihr sehr, sehr seltsam. Und ich ein großer Glückspilz. Gepriesen sei der Erhabene." {n}Ein nervöses Lachen steigt aus ihrer Brust auf, und sie errötet leicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Really?" {n}Jae looks at you in disbelief.{/n} "Then you are very, very strange. And I am very lucky. Praise be to the Exalted One." {n}A nervous chuckle bubbles up from her chest, and she blushes slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wirklich?" {n}Jae blickt dich ungläubig an.{/n} "Dann seid Ihr sehr, sehr seltsam. Und ich ein großer Glückspilz. Gepriesen sei der Erhabene." {n}Ein nervöses Lachen steigt aus ihrer Brust auf, und sie errötet leicht.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Really?" {n}Jae looks at you in disbelief.{/n} "Then you are very, very strange. And I am very lucky. Praise be to the Exalted One." {n}A nervous chuckle bubbles up from her chest, and she blushes slightly.{/n}

languages.text: "Gerçekten mi?" {n}Jae, şaşkın gözlerle sana bakıyor.{/n} "O hâlde çok ama çok tuhafsın. Ben de çok şanslıyım. Görkemli'ye şükürler olsun." {n}Göğsünden gergin bir gülümseme yükselip hafiften yanakları kızarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Really?" {n}Jae looks at you in disbelief.{/n} "Then you are very, very strange. And I am very lucky. Praise be to the Exalted One." {n}A nervous chuckle bubbles up from her chest, and she blushes slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten mi?" {n}Jae şoke olmuş gözlerle sana bakıyor.{/n} "O hâlde çok ama çok tuhaf birisin. Ben de çok şanslı biriyim. Görkemli'ye şükürler olsun." {n}Göğsünün en derinlerinden gergin bir gülümseme yükseliyor ve hafiften yanakları kızarıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
